description:
Redesign Application UI to Match Apple Liquid Glass 2026 Aesthetic

Completely overhaul the application interface to replicate Apple's Liquid Glass design system (2026 iteration), featuring glassmorphism, fluid animations, and depth-based layering.

Technical Implementation:
- Design System: Implement CSS-in-JS or Tailwind CSS custom theme matching Liquid Glass specifications
- Glassmorphism Effects: backdrop-filter with blur (20-40px), transparency layers (rgba with 0.6-0.9 alpha), subtle borders (1px rgba white/black)
- Color Palette: Extract and replicate Apple's 2026 palette (neutral grays, vibrant accent colors, adaptive light/dark modes)
- Typography: San Francisco Pro Display/Text font stack with appropriate weights (300-700)
- Animations: Framer Motion or React Spring for fluid transitions (300-600ms cubic-bezier easing)
- Depth System: Z-index hierarchy with floating cards, elevated surfaces, shadow layers (0-64px blur)

UI Components to Rebuild:
- Navigation: Translucent top bar with blur effect, floating sidebar with depth
- Cards: Rounded corners (12-20px), glass background, subtle shadows
- Buttons: Pill-shaped with glass effect, hover states with luminosity changes
- Modals: Center-floating with animated backdrop blur
- Forms: Floating labels, glass input fields with focus glow
- Lists/Tables: Alternating transparency, hover lift animations

Visual Effects:
- Parallax scrolling for depth perception
- Micro-interactions on all interactive elements (scale, glow, elevation changes)
- Smooth page transitions with shared element animations
- Dynamic light source simulation (pseudo-elements for highlights)
- Gradient overlays with noise texture for organic feel

Performance Optimizations:
- Use CSS containment for animation layers
- GPU acceleration via transform3d and will-change
- Lazy load animation libraries
- Optimize backdrop-filter usage (known performance cost)
- Implement reduced motion media queries for accessibility

Responsive Design:
- Breakpoints: Mobile (< 768px), Tablet (768-1024px), Desktop (> 1024px)
- Adapt glass intensity based on screen size
- Simplified effects on mobile for performance

Browser Compatibility:
- Fallbacks for backdrop-filter (solid backgrounds with opacity)
- Prefixed CSS properties (-webkit-backdrop-filter)
- Polyfills for older browsers or graceful degradation

Assets Required:
- Reference screenshots/videos from Apple Liquid Glass 2026 design
- Icon set matching Apple SF Symbols style
- High-resolution background images/gradients
- Noise textures for glass effect authenticity

Testing:
- Visual regression testing across browsers
- Performance metrics (FPS, paint times)
- Accessibility audit (contrast ratios with transparency)
- Dark mode parity verification
